posts.post_title: NEED T206 Sam Crawford, any pose
posts.post_content: Hi all- I am still looking for a graded Sam Crawford, pose and back not important but proper grade is. Looking for something in 4-5 range but will consider 3/3.5 as well. Thanks, Trent King
